title: Parenting Darien father dictates who friends are

content.question: Darien’s father dictated who Darien’s friends should be and what classes he should take, and he set an extremely early curfew. If Darien went against his father’s wishes, the repercussions were harsh and swift. What type of parenting did Darien experience?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
